DOC.brief_summary: The main objective study investigate effect ingestion different sport drink ( Nutrattente / Nutraperf / Nutrarecup ) fatigue induce tennis tournament simulation .
DOC.brief_title: Nutrition Effects Fatigue During Tennis Playing
